issue.subject: Chosen and External Libraries Management
issue.description:
Hello,

The actual version of easySDI (4.2.x) should be installed on Joomla 3.3 that includes chosen 0.14, but for SQL Server compatibilities, easySDI has to be installed on Joomla 3.1 that includes chosen 0.9.8.
Unfortunately, chosen 0.9.8 is bugged.

h1. How to fix:

h2. Temporarily Override formbehavior.chosen:

we can use an external chosen version until Joomla >3.1 does not support SQL Server.

h2. Leave formbehavior.chosen:

we do not use the library included in Joomla but we keep it in easySDI, managing ourselves chosen and its translation (accross the ini files) ; thus, we can update/override/fork the library when needed.
This solution begs the question more generally :
* do all external libraries need to be managed in the easySDI package ?
* most of EasySDI uses the jQuery framework, but some parts use Ext or more anecdotal Mootools : should it be standardized ? Should the framework be managed in the easySDI package ?
